author: clement
msg: Migrate the test suite to iPOJO 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT
Update the iPOJO start level of the lifecycle callback handler.

author: jeremias
msg: Added a flush() call in the resource handler to make sure unwritten content is flushed (not a bugfix but a precaution for an experiment I've done).

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: restored support for characters not in a font's standard encoding when PostScript is generated with resource optimization turned off.
